channel.title: CVE Feed for oauthlib -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for oauthlib -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-36087|2024-08-03T09:52:00.509Z -- oauthlib -- oauthlib
item.description: OAuthLib is an implementation of the OAuth request-signing logic for Python 3.6+. In OAuthLib versions 3.1.1 until 3.2.1, an attacker providing malicious redirect uri can cause denial of service. An attacker can also leverage usage of `uri_validate` functions depending where it is used. OAuthLib applications using OAuth2.0 provider support or use directly `uri_validate` are affected by this issue. Version 3.2.1 contains a patch. There are no known workarounds.
